text: The 1999–2000 Croatian Football Cup was the ninth edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Osijek were the defending champions, and it was won by Hajduk Split. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Round !! Main date !! Number of fixtures !! width=100 | Clubs !! ===First legs=== \---- ===Second legs=== Dinamo Zagreb won 6–1 on aggregate. \---- Hajduk Split won 4–3 on aggregate. ==Final== ===First leg=== ===Second leg=== Hajduk Split won 2–1 on aggregate.
